code: import*as actionTypes from"../store/actions/actiontypes";import{updateObject}from"./utility";var initialState={products:[],loading:false};var fetchProductsStart=function fetchProductsStart(state,action){return updateObject(state,{loading:true});};var fetchProductsSuccess=function fetchProductsSuccess(state,action){return updateObject(state,{products:action.products,loading:false});};var fetchProductsFail=function fetchProductsFail(state,action){return updateObject(state,{loading:false});};var reducer=function reducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case actionTypes.FETCH_PRODUCTS_START:return fetchProductsStart(state,action);case actionTypes.FETCH_PRODUCTS_SUCCESS:return fetchProductsSuccess(state,action);case actionTypes.FETCH_PRODUCTS_FAIL:return fetchProductsFail(state,action);default:return state;}};export default reducer;
